name: js-crypto-utils
description: JavaScript cryptographic utilities for OpenSSL-WebCrypto compatibility including PEM/X509-JWK converter.

scripts.test:bundle: npm run webpack && cross-env TEST_ENV=bundle npm run test
scripts.karma:bundle: npm run webpack && cross-env TEST_ENV=bundle ./node_modules/.bin/karma start
scripts.karma:window: npm run webpack && cross-env TEST_ENV=window ./node_modules/.bin/karma start
scripts.html: npm run html:source && npm run html:bundle && npm run html:window
scripts.html:source: cross-env TEST_ENV=source NODE_ENV=html npm run webpack
scripts.html:bundle: cross-env TEST_ENV=bundle NODE_ENV=html npm run webpack
scripts.html:window: cross-env TEST_ENV=window NODE_ENV=html npm run webpack
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production ./node_modules/.bin/babel src -d dist/ --keep-file-extension && npm run webpack:prod

author: Jun Kurihara
